pr_title: chore(engine/rest): add batch id to runtime variables

timeline.message:
chore(engine/rest): add batch id to runtime variables

- Adds column to SQL schema (create & upgrade scripts)
- Exposes `batchId` to variable instances
- Adds `batchIdIn` query criterion to variable instance query
- Exposes property and criterion to REST API variable endpoints

Related to CAM-12304

timeline.bodyText: Is there a specific reason you removed the "taskId"?
timeline.author: tmetzke
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -177,7 +179,7 @@ public void testGetSingleVariableInstanceSerialized() {
       .body("executionId", equalTo(builder.getExecutionId()))
       .body("caseInstanceId", equalTo(builder.getCaseInstanceId()))
       .body("caseExecutionId", equalTo(builder.getCaseExecutionId()))
-      .body("taskId", equalTo(builder.getTaskId()))
+      .body("batchId", equalTo(builder.getBatchId()))

replies.bodyText: Nice catch! This change was accidentally introduced.
replies.author: tasso94

timeline.author: tasso94
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -177,7 +179,7 @@ public void testGetSingleVariableInstanceSerialized() {
       .body("executionId", equalTo(builder.getExecutionId()))
       .body("caseInstanceId", equalTo(builder.getCaseInstanceId()))
       .body("caseExecutionId", equalTo(builder.getCaseExecutionId()))
-      .body("taskId", equalTo(builder.getTaskId()))
+      .body("batchId", equalTo(builder.getBatchId()))
